Jargon Term: embolized the vessel causing the bleed

Annotation: Medical Issues - Complication developed in the hospital

Jargon Term: Please STOP your imdur until seeing your cardiologist or primary care physician
Please REDUCE your lisinopril to 5mg until you see your primary care physician

When you have abdominal pain, take tyelenol first. If that does not relieve your symptoms you make take a percocet (please do not drink or drive while taking this medication as it can make you sleepy).
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Medication

Jargon Term: You may take ambien as needed for sleep
